description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url][url=https://legacy.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools/localization][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Help_Translate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=translate&color=ffbda3[/img][/url][url=https://github.com/Jodsderechte/DungeonAuraTools/releases/latest][img]https://badgen.net/github/release/Jodsderechte/DungeonAuraTools?style=flat-square[/img][/url]


I'm mainly a dps player so I might not realise if sth for Tank/Heal isn't working as it's supposed to if you find anything missing/buggy let me know!



This is still a big Work in Progress and Auras are being generated by [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools]My Addon[/URL] so head over there to be best prepared for The War Within. alternativly you can import them seperatly at the following urls:
[list]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons]https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons]https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons]https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons]https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons]https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons]https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons[/url]
[/list]



Currently has: 
[list]
[*]Grimrail Depot
[*] Iron Docks
[*] Shadowmoon Burial Grounds
[*] Everbloom
[/list]

Check out  [url=https://github.com/AcidWeb/Clean-Icons-Mechagnome-Edition]Clean Icons Mechagnome Edition[/url] if you want HD icon textures.
If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free.
If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1.
If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese]SharedMedia Causese[/url]
If you are using Causeses addon and do NOT want sounds select the group and go to Actions -> on Show and untick play sound


Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].
[s] Versioncheck [/s] Debuff/Interrupt idea  stolen from causese props to him

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html:
I'm mainly a dps player so I might not realise if sth for Tank/Heal isn't working as it's supposed to if you find anything missing/buggy let me know! This is still a big Work in Progress and Auras are being generated by My Addon so head over there to be best prepared for The War Within. alternativly you can import them seperatly at the following urls:
  • https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons
Currently has:
  • Grimrail Depot
  • Iron Docks
  • Shadowmoon Burial Grounds
  • Everbloom
Check out Clean Icons Mechagnome Edition if you want HD icon textures. If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free. If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1. If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: SharedMedia Causese If you are using Causeses addon and do NOT want sounds select the group and go to Actions -> on Show and untick play sound Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. Versioncheck Debuff/Interrupt idea stolen from causese props to him If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

comments.text: [taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] thank you, will give it a go

[taggeduser]@tale[/taggeduser] I think the internal version changed at some point. You should prob do a clean delete and reimport of the auras to get rid of any errors. Otherwise yeah you can get the addon, delete all auras and export them using dungeon aura tools then you won't have any problems either.

What is the preferred way to maintain these addons?  I still have the issue where WeakAuras Companion always say these need update even right after update.  Would running the Dungeon Aura Tools addon instead alleviate this problem?
[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] I see, thanks for the clarification!
[taggeduser]@ekwinoks#2660[/taggeduser] yes otherwise i'd have to change the name everytime i export to wago and i'll forget half the time
@jodsderechte It's importing as "DungeonAuras_WarlordOfDraenor" again (at least for me, don't know if anyone can confirm)
[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] Thank you so much, the swift response is greatly appreciated!
[taggeduser]@Nimchip[/taggeduser] oh I see the problem I'll fix that
This is how it looks when going for the update from 17 to 18:  https://i.imgur.com/xr838rn.png
[taggeduser]@oxed[/taggeduser] See my comment, its not on your end, the aura is screwed.

changelog.text: fixed missing trigger data introduced in last version
- added new Shadowmoon Burial Grounds Trash
fixes of bugs discovered during addon creation
fixed potential nil error in iron docks
- changed thunderous breath to an icon and made it working with (most) languages (only works for languages using latin alphabet)
- fixed [IRON DOCKS TRASH] Shattering Strike text

- added grimrail Trash
- i know there is a debug print in this Aura please let me know the info you get so i can properly setup the Aura thanks!
- fixed nil error in [IRON DOCKS TRASH] Shattering Strike
- fixed some bugs for shrouded and iron docks
- prelimarily added Iron docks and Grimrail
